title: New free champion rotation: Ekko, Nautilus, Nasus and more!

replies.body: Its not all bad most of the Ekko instalockers don't know what they are doing, if your facing one you are in luck if ones on your team good luck.... your gonna need it
R.I.P Mid lane. See you next week.

Well, now that the broken champion is free mid lane is now perma-lost or mirror lanes every game.

Also any one that wants to play Ekko top, you guys lost lane at champ select. It's like Yasuo top; not very effective.
I will never get mid now......all the nubs gonna be instalocking {{champion:245}} as if they are gods......
I can finally play Naut on my smurf. yes :'3

HEY LOOK IT'S EKKO, LOOKS LIKE I CAN TRY OUT NEW SKILLS
*aftermath of game*
Fuck this, ekko too op
